main event: A witness observed a bright, elliptical object changing colors in the sky over Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania on April 7, 1959.
interesting points: The object appeared to be moving slowly and changed colors from white to red., The witness observed the object for several minutes before it abruptly accelerated and disappeared., The object was silhouetted against the night sky and was about the size of a small automobile., There have been multiple reports of strange aerial objects in the Pittsburgh area during this time., The investigation concluded the sighting could not be scientifically evaluated due to lack of evidence.
witness description: a male, 35 years old, witnessed the event alone in his backyard
